data.title: EU Reg. 36-2012 Syria (Consolidated As of 30-11-2012) PDF
data.meta_description: EU Reg. 36-2012 Syria (Consolidated as of 30-11-2012).PDF - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a summary of Council Regulation (EU) No 36/2012 of 18 January 2012 concerning restrictive measures against Syria. It introduces restrictive measures such as an asset freeze and prohibits certain exports and investments. The regulation consolidates and replaces previous EU measures relating to the situation in Syria. It defines key terms and sets out the powers and procedures for amending lists of sanctioned individuals and entities.
